languages.text: {n}Лицо Урбенда Драйвстема белеет на глазах, за его спиной слышны женские всхлипы, переходящие в рыдания.{/n} "Ваша Светлость... Я принимаю ваше решение... с честью".

traits.locale_text: {n}Лицо Урбенда Драйвстема белеет на глазах, за его спиной слышны женские всхлипы, переходящие в рыдания.{/n} "Ваша Светлость... Я принимаю ваше решение... с честью".
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}Urbend Drivestem's face grows paler by the second. A woman's sobs can be heard from behind him, and they soon turn into desperate wails.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I accept your decision... with dignity."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо Урбенда Драйвстема белеет на глазах, за его спиной слышны женские всхлипы, переходящие в рыдания.{/n} "Ваша Светлость... Я принимаю ваше решение... с честью".

traits.locale_text: {n}Urbend Drivestem's face grows paler by the second, a woman is sobbing behind his back, about to break into tears.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I accept your decision... with dignity."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: {n}Urbend Drivestem's face grows paler by the second, a woman is sobbing behind his back, about to break into tears.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I accept your decision... with dignity."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: {n}Urbend Drivestem's face grows paler by the second. A woman's sobs can be heard from behind him, and they soon turn into desperate wails.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I accept your decision... with dignity."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: {n}Urbend Drivestem's face grows paler by the second. A woman's sobs can be heard from behind him, and they soon turn into desperate wails.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I accept your decision... with dignity."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}アーベント・ドライブステムの顔がたちまち青くなる、背後から女性のすすり泣きが聞こえ、やがてそれは絶望的な慟哭に変わる。{/n}「陛下…その決定を…堂々と受け入れます」
languages.original_text: {n}Urbend Drivestem's face grows paler by the second. A woman's sobs can be heard from behind him, and they soon turn into desperate wails.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I accept your decision... with dignity."

traits.locale_text: {n}アーベント・ドライブステムの顔がたちまち青くなる、背後から女性のすすり泣きが聞こえ、やがてそれは絶望的な慟哭に変わる。{/n}「陛下…その決定を…堂々と受け入れます」
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}听到这里，厄本·德莱夫斯塔的面色愈发苍白。他身后传来了女人的啜泣声，随后很快就变成了绝望的哀嚎。{/n}“大人……我愿意体面地……接受您的判决。”
languages.original_text: {n}Urbend Drivestem's face grows paler by the second. A woman's sobs can be heard from behind him, and they soon turn into desperate wails.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I accept your decision... with dignity."

traits.locale_text: {n}听到这里，厄本·德莱夫斯塔的面色愈发苍白。他身后传来了女人的啜泣声，随后很快就变成了绝望的哀嚎。{/n}“大人……我愿意体面地……接受您的判决。”
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}Urbend Drivestem blêmit tandis qu'une femme derrière lui sanglote, puis fond en larmes.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie... j'accepte votre décision... avec dignité. »
languages.original_text: {n}Urbend Drivestem's face grows paler by the second. A woman's sobs can be heard from behind him, and they soon turn into desperate wails.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I accept your decision... with dignity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Urbend Drivestem blêmit tandis qu'une femme derrière lui sanglote, puis fond en larmes.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie... j'accepte votre décision... avec dignité. »
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Urbend Drivestem palidece por segundos. Una mujer solloza a sus espaldas y su llanto pronto da paso a gemidos desesperados.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}... acepto su decisión... con dignidad».
languages.original_text: {n}Urbend Drivestem's face grows paler by the second. A woman's sobs can be heard from behind him, and they soon turn into desperate wails.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I accept your decision... with dignity."

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de Urbend Drivestem palidece por segundos. Una mujer solloza a sus espaldas y su llanto pronto da paso a gemidos desesperados.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}... acepto su decisión... con dignidad».
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}Urbend Drivestems Gesicht wird zunehmend blasser. Hinter ihm schluchzt eine Frau, als würde sie jeden Moment in Tränen ausbrechen.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Ich akzeptiere Eure Entscheidung ... mit Würde."
languages.original_text: {n}Urbend Drivestem's face grows paler by the second. A woman's sobs can be heard from behind him, and they soon turn into desperate wails.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I accept your decision... with dignity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Urbend Drivestems Gesicht wird zunehmend blasser. Eine Frau schluchzt hinter seinem Rücken auf, offenbar kurz davor, in Tränen auszubrechen.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Ich akzeptiere Eure Entscheidung ... mit Würde."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}Urbend Drivestem'in benzi attıkça atıyor. Valinin arkasından bir kadının iniltileri ve çaresiz feryatları duyuluyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri... Kararınızı... Saygıyla kabul ediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Urbend Drivestem's face grows paler by the second. A woman's sobs can be heard from behind him, and they soon turn into desperate wails.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I accept your decision... with dignity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Urbend Drivestem'in benzi attıkça atıyor. Valinin arkasından bir kadın iniltileri ve çaresiz feryatları kulağa geliyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri... Kararınızı... saygıyla kabul ediyorum."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor
